name: test_e2e_with_logs[022_SQLI_TIME_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_TIME_003` |
| **Name** | SQL Server WAITFOR DELAY |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | time_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'`
- **Encoded**: `WAITFOR%20DELAY%20%270%3A0%3A5%27`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~37000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:40:53.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_003-1765806053445-gsa9m1 pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_003 uri=/?q=WAITFOR%20DELAY%20%270%3A0%3A5%27 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
13:40:53.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_TIME_003-1765806053445-gsa9m1 pattern_id=SQLI_TIME_003 uri=/?q=WAITFOR%20DELAY%20%270%3A0%3A5%27 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
